text: accamayam (avviru peṇkaḷil) orutti mikka nāṇattuṭaṉ ivar muṉ vantu ‘‘nīr eṅka(ḷ kālnaṭaika)ḷukkut taṇṇīr pukaṭṭiyataṟkuriya kūliyai umakkuk koṭukkum poruṭṭu meyyākavē eṉ tantai um'mai aḻaikkiṟār'' eṉṟu kūṟi aḻaittuc ceṉṟāḷ. Mūsā avariṭam ceṉṟu taṉ carittirattaik kūṟavē avar (iṉi) ‘‘nīr payappaṭa vēṇṭām. Aniyāyakkāra makkaḷaiviṭṭu nīr tappittuk koṇṭīr'' eṉṟu kūṟiṉār
